program: Master of Science in Computer Science (MSCS)

sections.text: UChicago’s MSCS provides advanced preparation in computer science theory, systems, and applications with flexible pathways.

items: Core courses in programming, systems, and theory
Electives in AI, machine learning, and data science
sections.text: Students complete a structured core, pursue electives in specialized areas, and finish with a project or thesis.
Admission requires a bachelor’s degree and quantitative skills; GRE is optional.
Graduates enter careers in software engineering, data science, AI/ML, and further doctoral studies.
